titleStmt.title: The remonstrance and protestation, of the gentry, and commonalty of the counties of Buckingham, Bedford, Hartford, and Cambridge. Shewing the reasons why they take up armes, and their resolutions thereupon. Tendered by them at their meeting with the Parliaments forces, to the view of the world, Decemb. 7.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L. N. and R. C. for F. Eaglesfield, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Marigold, in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Marigold, in Pauls Church-yard
